column5: Fun unique home with private river access. 5 bedroom, 5 bathroom home, with plenty of room. Full kitchen, laundry room, living room with fireplace and a flat screen TV. Party room with bar, pool table, kitchenette, and a loft with sitting area and a flat screen TV. Outside BBQ area with gas cooktop, grill, TV, fire pit, and a chicken coop full of fresh eggs. Very close to Criders - famous Rodeo and Dance Hall. Wi-Fi and Directv.
column8: Hill Country Oasis with River Access
